problem_text_cn: 如图,AB是⊙O的直径,直线PA与⊙O相切于点A,PO交⊙O于点C,连接BC．若∠ABC=25°,则∠P的度数为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the diameter of ⊙O, straight line PA and ⊙O are tangent to point A, PO intersects ⊙O at point C, and connect BC. If ∠ABC = N_0, then the degree of ∠P is ()
raw_comment: 本题主要考查切线的性质及圆周角定理,根据圆周角定理可切线的性质分别求得∠AOP和∠PAO的度数是解题的关键．
